home.Explain the method of searching for the: Explain the method of searching for the medicine you want, finding information about it, booking it and the method of payment
home.Type the name of the medicine you want t: Type the name of the medicine you want to search for in Arabic or English and then click the Search button
home.The medicine will show you the picture a: The medicine will show you the picture and information about it available or not and the price
home.Then book the medicine and the pharmacy: Then book the medicine and the pharmacy will communicate with you and pay the money when you receive the drug and make sure it
home.Information: Information about what is between the medicine Originator / Brand-name Medicine and Generic Medicine
home.It is the innovator medicine created by: It is the innovator medicine created by a drug commpany after acostly procedure of development and research and the company holds the marketing rights for a specific period (patent)
home.other: Other companies are allowed to produce the medicine under different trade names, after the legal protection period (17 - 20 years).Usually have lower prices because the manufacturing company did not incur any research costs.
home.perssure: The pharmacy has the best pressure gauges and provides this service for delivery to the home
home.sugar: The pharmacy provides a sugar meter service with the latest precision equipment you can request for this service
home.Change: The pharmacy provided a change service on wounds that can be ordered to the home if it is not possible to get to the pharmacy
home.Installation: The pharmacy has a sterile laboratory for the installation of medicines and this is in accordance with the availability of his doctorate from the doctor
home.body: The pharmacy has an inbody device to measure weight, height, body fat, muscle mass, heartbeat, and body burning speed.
